16.5 Deep Drift & Stonga's Laboratory.name: 16.5 深层平巷 & 斯托诺佳的实验室

多重攻击.name: 多重攻击
多重攻击.description: The deepdreck makes two attacks, using [[/item Claw]] or [[/item Putrid Emission]] in any combination.

爪击.name: 爪击
爪击.description: Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]] hit, reach 5 ft., one target., Hit: [[/damage average]] damage.

Putrid Emission.name: Putrid Emission
Putrid Emission.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: [[/attack]] to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target is &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] until the start of the deepdreck’s next turn.

Explosive Death.name: Explosive Death
Explosive Death.description: When the deepdreck dies, it explodes, and each creature within 15 feet of it must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 13 ([[/r 3d8]]) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Fragrance Aversion.name: Fragrance Aversion
Fragrance Aversion.description: The deepdreck has disadvantage on attack rolls and saving throws while within 10 feet of burning incense or a creature wearing Perfume.

掘道者.name: 掘道者
掘道者.description: The deepdreck can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 5-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

多重攻击.name: 多重攻击
多重攻击.description: The deepdreck makes two attacks, using [[/item Claw]] or [[/item Putrid Emission]] in any combination.

爪击.name: 爪击
爪击.description: Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]] hit, reach 5 ft., one target., Hit: [[/damage average]] damage.

Putrid Emission.name: Putrid Emission
Putrid Emission.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: [[/attack]] to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target is &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] until the start of the deepdreck’s next turn.

Explosive Death.name: Explosive Death
Explosive Death.description: When the deepdreck dies, it explodes, and each creature within 15 feet of it must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 13 ([[/r 3d8]]) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Fragrance Aversion.name: Fragrance Aversion
Fragrance Aversion.description: The deepdreck has disadvantage on attack rolls and saving throws while within 10 feet of burning incense or a creature wearing Perfume.

掘道者.name: 掘道者
掘道者.description: The deepdreck can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 5-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

多重攻击.name: 多重攻击
多重攻击.description: The pumpkin head makes one [[/item Claw]] attack and one [[/item Pitchfork]] attack, and it can use Personality Consumption if available.

爪击.name: 爪击
爪击.description: Melee Attack Roll: [[/attack]], reach 5 ft. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage.

草叉.name: 草叉
草叉.description: Melee Attack Roll: [[/attack]], reach 10 ft. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage, and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, the pumpkin head can push or pull it 5 feet.

Personality Consumption.name: Personality Consumption
Personality Consumption.description:
The pumpkin head consumes a victim’s memories.

Intelligence Saving Throw: DC 12, one creature the pumpkin head can see within 30 feet.

Failure: The target has the &reference[stunned apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn, and its Intelligence score decreases by [[/r 1d4]]. The target dies if this reduces that score to 0. A Humanoid slain in this way is replaced by a Pumpkin Head* [[/r 1d8]] hours later unless its body is burned.

拟声.name: 拟声
拟声.description: The pumpkin head can mimic the voice of the person it replaced or someone it used Personality Consumption on. A creature that hears the voice can tell it’s an imitation only with a successful DC 14 Wisdom (Insight) check.

Sorrowful Memento.name: Sorrowful Memento
Sorrowful Memento.description: If the pumpkin head can see a creature holding a possession of the person the pumpkin head replaced, it has Disadvantage on D20 Tests.

18.2 Blighted Wood & Festering Wilds Enc.name: 18.2 枯萎林带与溃烂林野遭遇

腐化触击.name: 腐化触击
腐化触击.description: 近战武器攻击：命中[[/attack]]，触及 5 尺，单一目标。命中：[[/damage average]]伤害。

Consuming Bite (Devourer Only).name: Consuming Bite (Devourer Only)
Consuming Bite (Devourer Only).description: Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]] to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is &Reference[Grappled apply=false] (escape DC 13). At the start of a &Reference[Grappled apply=false] target’s turn, it takes 10 ([[/r 3d6]]) necrotic damage, and the shrouded regains hit points equal to that amount.

Scythe (Reaper Only).name: Scythe  (Reaper Only)
Scythe (Reaper Only).description: Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]] to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage. If the target is a creature, it can’t regain hit points until the start of the shrouded’s next turn.

Toxic Thoughts (Whisperer Only).name: Toxic Thoughts  (Whisperer Only)
Toxic Thoughts (Whisperer Only).description: The shrouded fills the area within 30 feet of it with mental anguish. Each creature that isn’t a Construct or Undead within that area must make a DC 13 Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes 7 ([[/r 2d6]]) psychic damage and is &Reference[Frightened apply=false] until the start of the shrouded’s next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage only.

Mist Form.name: Mist Form
Mist Form.description: The shrouded can enter another creature’s space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without squeezing.

Corrupting Mist.name: Corrupting Mist
Corrupting Mist.description: A creature that starts its turn in the shrouded’s space must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw, taking 10 ([[/r 3d6]]) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The soul of a Humanoid that dies from this damage becomes a new shrouded at the start of the shrouded’s next turn and takes its turn on that initiative. The Humanoid can’t be returned to life until the new shrouded is destroyed.

Graveyard Warding.name: Graveyard Warding
Graveyard Warding.description: The shrouded can’t move through a space with a barrier or line of iron, such as a wrought iron fence or a line of iron filings. This impassible barrier rises to a height of 1 mile above the iron.

Variation.name: Variation
Variation.description: The shrouded has one of three variants, which determines a unique action option: Devourer, Reaper, or Whisperer.
